system.description: When you organize a protest, roll with a Circle of your fellow organizers.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, someone you trusted leaks your secrets to a dangerous foe.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, your protest puts pressure on a powerful NPC of your choice; they take a -1 ongoing through the next faction turn.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, your protest puts pressure on a powerful NPC of your choice; they take a -1 ongoing through the next faction turn.

On a 10+, the leader of another faction takes interest in your cause and delivers a Debt, powerful resources, or secret information that aids your cause.
